ValidationRule.description: If user does not have approval authority defined for his/her user account, and if he/she attempts to set Review Status to approved, and if analyst recommended limit does NOT = credit authorised limit, then throw error message.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Id !='00570000001tweu',IF( AND ( AND($Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'Integration User') , RecordType.Name = 'WES Accounts', Recommended_credit_limit__c <> Credit_authorised_limit__c) , ISBLANK($User.WES_Approval_Threshold__c) ,False ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your user account does not have an approval threshold defined. Please contact your system admin for assistance.
